name: Backup
description: a mod that allows you to easily backup your save file :D

Max_Auto_Backups.name: Max Auto Backups
Max_Auto_Backups.description: How many backups the mod autosaves before starting to delete old ones for space.

Button_In_Options_Menu.name: Button In Options Menu
Button_In_Options_Menu.description: Moves the button of the mod to the settings menu.
